title: This is a Must for Your Bucket List . . .
post: That is our town, mall and Shroud Exhibit and Museum.  very nice, Dan.
author: Andy

title: This is a Must for Your Bucket List . . .
post: Andy, how big is the mall compared to other malls in the town? Is it really a dead mall?
author: Mike M

title: This is a Must for Your Bucket List . . .
post: We don’t have “malls” in town.  If we want a mall we drive to Las Cruces or El Paso.
author: Andy

title: This is a Must for Your Bucket List . . .
post: It’s like a covered shopping center.  The Shroud museum is between Penny’s and the Recruiter’s office.
author: Andy
